title: Hypnosis Game
description: Kira and her friends wake up in Kaleb's mysterious mansion only to be given a chance to win millions of dollars. The game is simple: escape the mansion by the end of the night un-hypnotized and they win. But if they lose, Kaleb is keeping Kira. Forever. And with the rooms of spirals, video games programmed with subliminal messaging, and the many, many mind games, the odds do not look well for her and her group.One game. One winner. And Master Kaleb won't stop until she is mindless for him. Until her body and mind are his.Warning: This adult romance story of 20,000 words contains mature sexual situations involving hypnosis
author: Kat Hailey
